title: Interpret the Meaning of A(x)
text: We can find the maximum area of the patio by finding the maximum point of the function A(x).

title: Put The Parabola Into Standard Form
text: We need to foil out the function A(x) and put it into standard form before finding the maximum. $$A(x)=x \left(80-2x\right)=-2x^2+80x$$

title: Decide the Shape of Parabola
text: Given any parabola in the form $${ax}^2+bx+c$$, a is called the leading coefficient of the parabola. If a is negative, the parabola opens downward. If a is positive, the parabola opens upward.

title: Decide the Shape of Parabola
text: Since a is negative, the parabola opens downward. So the quadratic equation has a maximum.

title: Find the Equation For Axis of Symmetry
text: Given $${ax}^2+bx+c$$, the axis of symmetry for the parabola is $$x=\frac{-b}{2a}$$.

title: Find the Equation For Axis of Symmetry
text: In the given parabola, $$a=-2$$, $$b=80$$. The axis of symmetry is $$x=20$$.
